data.approach: Add callback prop to StatusActionBadge for post-action collapse. In SessionCard.handleStatusAction(), after certain actions complete (complete, cleanup, complete-kill), call new onActionComplete callback. TasksActive passes collapse handler similar to onCtrlEnterSubmit pattern.

data.taskTitle: when user selects statusactionbadge > complete collapse/close the session
summary: Added onActionComplete callback prop to SessionCard component
Wired up onActionComplete in handleStatusAction for 5 actions: cleanup, complete, complete-kill, kill, close-kill
Added onActionComplete handler in TasksActive.svelte that mirrors onCtrlEnterSubmit behavior
Different delays used: 300ms for quick actions (cleanup, kill, close-kill), 1400ms for complete actions (complete, complete-kill)

summary: Investigated behavior for closing session after completing a status action
Compared existing input submission close behavior with potential status action close behavior
Considered implementation options for session collapse/close on action submission

suggestedTasks.title: Implement Session Close Logic for Status Action Completion
suggestedTasks.description: Develop consistent UI interaction for closing/collapsing session when status action is completed. Specifically implement session close behavior in StatusActionBadge component. Evaluate whether to close on all actions or just 'complete' status. Update interaction patterns to match existing input submission close behavior.
suggestedTasks.reason: Extend existing session management interaction patterns

suggestedTasks.title: Define Session Close Interaction Requirements
suggestedTasks.description: Create clear specification for when and how sessions should close after status actions. Document decision points around closing on all actions versus specific status changes. Capture user experience considerations and potential edge cases.

documentationNeeds: Update interaction design guidelines for status actions
